hero.title: Create Perfect Bait Mixes

donation.title: Support Development
donation.description: This application is in active development and represents my only source of income. Your support helps keep the service free and add new features.
donation.benefits: All donors will receive exclusive benefits in the final version

catalog.title: Complete Catalog

step1.description: Browse our catalog and select the flours that interest you.

step2.title: Calculate your mix

step3.title: Analyze and adjust
step3.description: Visualize the properties of your mix and refine it according to your needs.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose your plan
pricing.description: Solutions adapted to all needs, from the passionate amateur to the demanding professional

free.name: Free
features: Mix Calculator: For functionality testing only. No actual values ‚Äã‚Äãfor everything.

pro.name: Pro
features: Anti-nutrient values ‚Äã‚Äãdefined on the basis of distribution by type: lectins, tannins, saponins, phytic acid and trypsin inhibitors. Total 100%

enterprise.name: Enterprise
features: Public Catalog with simplified details + Enterprise Catalog + Private with advanced details
Data Access API: Enterprise Tools --> Table Analyzer: Import and Export of flours in CSV file format
Dedicated support 24/6 from 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM and 2:00 PM to 6:00 PM

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I change plans at any time?
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will take effect at the next billing period.
faq.a2: No, all our plans are without commitment. You can cancel at any time.
faq.a3: Billing is {billingInterval} and automatic. You will receive an invoice by email with each renewal.
faq.q4: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
faq.a4: You retain access to all features until the end of the current period. Then your account will automatically revert to the free version.

donation.title: Donation
donation.paragraph1: To make this application work, I need to invest time and money. I work about 50 to 100 hours a week on it,
donation.paragraph2: and I spend a lot of money on software, including purchasing certified lists of the different ingredients that make up a boilie mix.
donation.paragraph3: Unfortunately, most fishing companies have a policy of not collaborating with software developers. That's why I pay extra for everything. I have no sponsors and am open to any potential proposals.
donation.paragraph4: I would like to collaborate with the company ROD OLIVER: https://www.rodoliver.com/, which specializes in developing carp fishing baits. No collaboration has been discussed to date. For now, it's only a hope.
donation.warningBox: Your donation helps keep this application going. It currently represents my only source of income. üöß Application in development üöß: I can no longer continue development; my own finances are no longer sufficient. I am currently unemployed. Anyone who has donated will benefit from the final version of the application. This information is yet to be determined.
donation.infoBox: For your information: Subscriptions are currently available and free, as is registration.
donation.donateButton: Faire un don avec PayPal / Donate with PayPal
donation.thanks: Thank you for reading and understanding‚ù§

footer.aboutText: CarpBait Pro helps you create optimized bait mixes for carp fishing.
footer.contactText: Have a question? Don't hesitate to contact us.

textWindow.PetiteExplicationContent: This application is designed to help you create optimized bait mixes for carp fishing. Browse our catalog of flours, use our calculator to create your mixes, and save your favorite recipes.
textWindow.antinutriensContent:
Anti-nutrient Recommended threshold (%) in a mix	Notes
Phytic acid	‚â§ 0.4%.	Beyond this level, it begins to disrupt mineral absorption (Ca, Zn, Fe, etc.).
			Partially neutralized by phytase or fermentation.

Trypsin inhibitors	‚â§ 0.1%.	Reduces the efficiency of protein digestion.
			Disrupts protein digestion, especially in young carp.

Lectins	‚â§ 0.05%.	Can cause intestinal inflammation at higher doses.
			Can damage the intestinal mucosa. Sensitive to heat.

Tannins	‚â§ 0.5%.	Tolerable if the bait is intended for a short baiting phase.
			Antioxidant effect at low doses, but reduces digestibility.

Saponins	‚â§ 0.1%.	In excess, can irritate the intestinal mucosa.
			Possible irritation. Stimulant potential at very low doses.

Total anti-nutrients	‚úÖ ‚â§ 1.5%	of the mix (recommended target value) In practice: ideally between 0.8 and 1.2%
